Reviews.Title: “Perfect place to stay in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Ioanna T
Reviews.Content: 4 friends absolutely satisfied florida hotel neighborhood 5 minutes foot st peters basilica 15 walking romes city center walking guy easily metro line ottaviano 2 minutes distance hotel plenty trattorias restaurants bars people moreover largest market road via del corso spend day shopping booked quadruple clean cozy pay additional fee 5 eurosperson continental breakfast buffet staff friendly helpful dont hesitate help pleased provided urge choose vacation city rome

Reviews.Title: “Tiny but clean and friendly”
Reviews.Author: Anitarita
Reviews.Content: tiny bathroom tinier clean receptionists desk friendly especially barbara directed amazing restaurants helped bus etc location minutes vatican rest rome definitely opt breakfast buffet hotel cheaper else found neighborhood hotel worth money

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Tidy, Quiet, Small Rooms”
Reviews.Author: Noneslee
Reviews.Content: looking outside hotel wasnt inside lovely clean tidy little livable bathrooms decent equipted booked affiliated hotel transferred hotel florida prefer florida location vatican suggest coming rome 1st time stay closer tourist attractions eurostars near train station wonderful little quiet night times require lot coordination bus systems excellent stay

Reviews.Title: “Quaint and love the location”
Reviews.Author: javajive2
Reviews.Content: frontdesk ladies rita barbara friendly helpful able assist request getting tv adaptor power socket loved location hotel minutes vatican shops restaurants comfortable stay hotel wished booked superior instead standard dated shower stall tiny

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel Great Location Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: Kathleen M
Reviews.Content: absolutely delighted visit rome hotel florida booked minute hotel discount superior arrived upgraded extra cost junior suite newly renovated view main street hotel 10 minutes vatican 10 15 mins accross river pleasant walk novona didnt metro rome beautiful enjoying weather hotel worth 3 times paid 3 nights

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location for trip to Rome”
Reviews.Author: YorkiesEngland
Reviews.Content: hotel lovely location close vatican 10 minute walk metro metro cheap easy lots nice restaurants hotel junior suite front hotel clean modern comfortable staff friendly helpful breakfast value quality stay tea coffee facilities sky tv

Reviews.Title: “Not quite as luxurious as it looks but good stay”
Reviews.Author: misstyg
Reviews.Content: isnt luxurious hotel cramped people functional maids job clean ac didnt breakfasts £5 morning bargin compared cafes rome located main shopping street location

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: sankits
Reviews.Content: lovely travelling loved hotel traveled wife 20 months son staff helpful spoke tips visit major helped babys food milk locationjust minutes stpeters basilica shopping market plenty restaurants nice evening walk highly recommended sandy uk

Reviews.Title: “Clean och nice hotell at good value”
Reviews.Author: MrsHanna
Reviews.Content: 6 adults stayed april 2011 3 superior price bed single normal size third little bigger cleaned day overall nice quiet tv lot channels italian superior mini bar location near vatican city busy street lot shopping walked city insted using public transportation maybe 20 minutes historical centre 40 min trastevere lot restaurants coffee shops supermarket neighborhood additional cost 5 euro person day continental breakfast included bread butter cheese ham jam yoghurt musli cereals juice fruit pastries request staff helpful pleased hotel florida stay weather april 27 sky

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel, Helpful staff, centrally situated”
Reviews.Author: StanDcar
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights mid feb staff reception helpful advice catch shuttle bus airport saved bit money hotel busy shopping street quiet tranquil youre hotel forget cleaned towels changed day hotel lovely available free charge chill night remember february ten minute walk vatican nearest metro stop 510 minute walk metro takes colisseum circus maximus trevi fountain spanish steps free maps rome available hotel reception help thoroughly recommend rome definitely stay hotel florida

Reviews.Content: read unfavourable reviews hotel vatican unsure expect decided based location price hotel arrange transportation airport hotel taht figure arrival rome arrived rome flight toronto tired excited soon gates driver waiting holding sign name approached dragging bags driver speak english matter understood follow ride airport fast trouble keeping didnt lose crowd people practically ran didnt lost mini van piled rushed finish quickly word advise seat belt unfortunately didnt drivers rome absolutely insane closer heavier traffic driver swerved sped formula 500 race suddenly daughter literally flew seats hurt knee didnt dare speak driver stopped van yelling door people exactly happend loud heated finally reached destination waited retrieve bags sped continue race hotel buzz building 2 flights stairs reception yes lift 3 3 sets bags opted climb receptionist lovely told noticed husbands birthday day complimentary upgrade superior nice clean european standards staff hotel absolutely helpful pleasant booked vatican tour helped maps little stay pleasant housekeeping job day hotel walking distance metro close loved staying hustle centre rome easily tons restaurants cafes nearby amazing food people watching farmers market steps hotel return hotel florida

Reviews.Title: “fit our needs, clean & good location”

Reviews.Content: couple mother aunt stayed close vatican block 2 stores restaurants short walking distance happ stay sleep shower 3 days enjoying rome standards accustomed living queen 2 twin beds booked quadruple course bathroom tiny clean efficient service

Reviews.Title: “For us--Perfect!”

Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed week hotel decent sized hot water showers clean cleanliness hotel met standards staff helpful able communicate spanish english dont speak italian location 5 minutes vatican walking distance main sites city center isnt internet tv available italian wasnt
